game.name: Cinderella Pony Caring
game.description:
Cute and beautiful Cinderella spends most of her time in the palace with her cute pony. Pony is her small horse who is very naughty in nature. She accompanies princess everywhere in the palace. Being independent in nature, sometimes she does not listen to the princess. She got hurt while playing alone at the corner of the palace. Many kings, princesses, diplomats and other imp guests are about to come today on a grand reception. Cinderella is busy there, so help Pony to treat and give her a proper bath in Cinderella Pony Caring Game.

The mistress has a plenty of other things to take care of while meeting with guests. Your objective in this one of the best girls games is to grab all the necessary tools and provide him with the needful treatment for her wounds. Start it with lashing mane comb, washing her house with the scented shampoos and soaps in this animal game for girls! Do not forget to grease cuts special solution bottle using a red cross. Make sure to check if all her wounds are healed properly. 
 
It will depend on your skills how to help this pony enjoy a cheerful and dazzling smile again. The princess Cinderella would love to see her horse in a good condition. Do your best to bring the smile on the face of your favorite princess and a cute and little pony in this html5 cleaning game! All the best to have a blast and have fun in our free top girls games, no download required!
